did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Pamphlet of Bernhard's memoirs, and a second pamphlet which is an addendum to his memoirs.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Cornell University Class of 1926. Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, New York Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Pamphlet of Bernhard's memoirs, and a second pamphlet which is an addendum to his memoirs. Discusses his association with Shreve, Lamb and Harmon (later Shreve, Lamb and Harmon Associates) and includes the names R. Harold Shreve, Irvin Leslie Scott, Serge P. Petroff, Robert W. Jones, and Philip Will, Jr.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Lambda Alpha International. New York Chapter.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Harold C. Bernhard memoirs, #3805. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Part of Lambda Alpha Literary Archives.

did.unittitle: Pamphlet of Bernhard's memoirs, and a second pamphlet which is an addendum to his memoirs

scopecontent.p: Discusses his association with Shreve, Lamb and Harmon (later Shreve, Lamb and Harmon Associates) and includes the names R. Harold Shreve, Irvin Leslie Scott, Serge P. Petroff, Robert W. Jones, and Philip Will, Jr.
